meanings.definition: wild animals that are not domesticated
meanings.sent1: The ferals in the forest hunt for food on their own.
meanings.sent2: We should be cautious around ferals as they may not be friendly.
meanings.sent3: The ferals decided to have a party in the woods, how funny!
meanings.sent4: The city streets at night become a playground for the ferals.
meanings.sent5: The ferals' eyes gleamed in the darkness, a sight to remember.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of wild animals
meanings.sent1: The ferals tracks were visible in the mud.
meanings.sent2: The ferals instincts helped them survive in the wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The ferals fashion show featured animal prints, quite amusing!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as untamed as the ferals roaming the hills.
